alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 01 at 8:10PM CDT until November 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Are Expected Again Wednesday... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 079, 080, 081, AND 252... * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne and Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy, Fire Weather Zone 080 Hitchcock and Fire Weather Zone 081 Red Willow. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
